otherNames: 光子英雄传:超神灵主, 光子英雄传：超神灵主, Psionic Masters, Supreme Spirit Master
synopsis: I found a strange black knife, I also bumped unexpectedly into a cute girl. It changed my fate completely. It was the end of my boring and steady life of this summer of solidarity. It was a new exciting world. Time to fight to change my fate!
